description: Temporary Help Services and has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers generated from CPSS who are qualified under the streams and categories listed above.
full_summary:
### Temporary Help Services for Computer Application Support
#### Notice Summary

 Department of National Defense (DND) has released a Request for Proposal (RFP) in support of its Temporary Help Services requirement. This requirement is open to select Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders who have qualified under specific streams and categories.

#### Details of the Requirement

* **Tender Title**: Temporary Help Services – Computer Application Support under the Supplies Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Service)
* **Trade Agreements**: The RFP is issued under the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity/Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Security Level**: Secret

#### Details of the Tender

* **Solicitation Number**: S4778071
* **Publication Date**: January 9, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 12, 2024 at 15:00:00
* **Tender Status**: Expired

#### Eligible Businesses

To be eligible to respond, businesses must hold a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) under EN578-172870 and be qualified under the following streams and categories:
Stream 5.1: Computer Application Support. Please review the CPSS (Centralized Professional Services System) for a complete list of eligible businesses.

#### Proposal Requirements

The RFP requires a proposal from eligible businesses, detailing their approach to supplying temporary help services for computer application support. Please refer to the attached RFP document for further details.

#### Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of National Defense
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, ON K2H 8G1, Canada
* **Contact Name**: CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
* **Contact Email**: CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone**: (613) 971-7955

#### Document Retrieval

The RFP document is available for download at the following link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28913/s4778071--rfp-%28english.pdf


I hope this meets the request. Let me know if any further adjustments are required. I’ve formatted the text to use proper headings and lists for clarity.
